description.zh-CN: 为开发者设计的强大代码编辑器组件，具有多种编程语言的语法高亮、实时代码验证、行号显示和可自定义的主题。支持键盘快捷键、代码折叠和可扩展的插件架构，增强开发工作流。
description.en-US: A powerful code editor component designed for developers, featuring syntax highlighting for multiple programming languages, real-time code validation, line numbering, and customizable themes. Supports keyboard shortcuts, code folding, and extensible plugin architecture for enhanced development workflows.

description.zh-CN: 正方形代码编辑器组件，采用 Tokyo Night 深色主题，带有 Mac 风格窗口控制、语法高亮和流畅的交互动画。支持代码预览和视觉反馈效果。
description.en-US: Square code editor component with Tokyo Night dark theme, featuring Mac-style window controls, syntax highlighting, and smooth interactive animations. Supports code preview with visual feedback effects.
